summary: Adds parallax to roads and bridges. Check description.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/192/7/3/font_by_kaya47-d6d3ddo.png[/IMG]

[YOUTUBE]eNZaWkoQj-s[/YOUTUBE]
[COLOR=#7c7c7c]Video by hodilton[/COLOR]
[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/192/f/4/fontdescription_by_kaya47-d6d36po.png[/IMG]
[COLOR=#7c7c7c]This mod is intended to be used with [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607/?][COLOR=#91d6be]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c].
Basically this mod:
[LIST]
[*]adds parallax map to Skyrim HD - 2K Textures roads;
[*]optimizes road textures (diffuse map) from Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by reducing their size from 5.5MB to 2.7MB without quality loss;
[*]enhances and optimizes SHD2K`s normal maps;
[*]adds new high quality textures, normal maps and parallax maps to bridges;
[/LIST]
Unlike other mods, this also adds parallax to snowy/icy roads and leafy roads.
Episode Parallax adds support for [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17275//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Solitude[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (a bridge from Solitude) and [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655/?][COLOR=#91d6be]SMIM[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (bridges).
Please let me know if i missed anything.
If you have any suggestions feel free to leave feedback, i`ll be happy to hear about it.
Criticism is also welcomed.

[IMG]http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/192/8/2/fontrequirements_by_kaya47-d6d36un.png[/IMG]
[LIST]
[*]ENB .112 or later, if you don\'t have it you can`t run this mod or any other parallax mods. [/COLOR][URL=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm][COLOR=#91d6be]Download it from here[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c].
[*]set \"FixParallaxBugs\" to \"true\" in the enbseries.ini.
[*]you can also get alternative ENB presets, [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/?][COLOR=#91d6be]RealVision ENB[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (adapted for Climates of Tamriel) or [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37997/?][COLOR=#91d6be]Tundra ENB[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (adapted for vanilla weathers) being one of the best from my perspective.
[/LIST]
[IMG]http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/192/e/d/fontinstallation_by_kaya47-d6d370m.png[/IMG]
[LIST]
[*]download files manually, extract (winrar, 7zip) and put them in your Data folder. Enable EpisodeParallax.esp using your favorite launcher.
[*]if you have [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655/?][COLOR=#91d6be]SMIM[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] installed (higly recommended), download Episode Parallax - SMIM Patch, extract and drop (overwrite four files) into Data folder.
[*]if you have [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17275//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Solitude[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (higly recommended), manually download Episode Parallax - PP Solitude Patch, extract and drop (overwrite one file) into Data folder.
[/LIST]
[IMG]http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/192/0/a/fontcredits_by_kaya47-d6d341r.png[/IMG]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3101794/?][COLOR=#91d6be]NebuLa1[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] for Skyrim HD - 2K Textures
[/COLOR][URL=http://ftourini.deviantart.com/art/tileable-stone-wall-texture01-217328604][COLOR=#91d6be]ftourini[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] from Deviantart for bridge texture
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/996477/?][COLOR=#91d6be]osmodius[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] for helping
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3212020/?][COLOR=#91d6be]Hein84[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] for helping
Kaya47 for normal maps, parallax maps and the rest of the junk

[IMG]http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/192/c/5/fontrecommended_by_kaya47-d6d38rh.png[/IMG]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607][COLOR=#91d6be]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] (almost required)
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16919//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Whiterun[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17275//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Solitude[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17754//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Windhelm[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18544//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Markarth[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c]
[/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38004/?][COLOR=#91d6be]Rocking Stones Parallax[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c]

If you have [/COLOR][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18814//?][COLOR=#91d6be]Project Parallax - Roads and Bridges[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#7c7c7c] installed, overwrite files. This mod is an alternative to Project Parallax - Roads and Bridges.

[IMG]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/192/8/a/fontlegal_by_kaya47-d6d3a0h.png[/IMG]
You`re free to use these assets as long as you give credits to their respective owners/makers.
You might need explicit permission from NebuLa1 to use his textures.
[/COLOR]
author: Kaya47

files.name: Episode Parallax - Project Parallax Solitude Patch
